thread.title: watchOS 2.0.1 arrives with battery life improvements and Apple Pay fix
thread.title_full: watchOS 2.0.1 arrives with battery life improvements and Apple Pay fix

title: watchOS 2.0.1 arrives with battery life improvements and Apple Pay fix
text:
watchOS 2.0.1 arrives with battery life improvements and Apple Pay fix 
The Inquirer Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
the release of watchOS 2.0, the first major software update for the smartwatch that brought support for native apps and WiFi, and an Activation Lock feature. 
This latest update isn't quite so exciting and instead focuses on improving the overall performance of the...
